item.description:
Caspian is a local (Beverly, MA) post-rock band (RIFL: Explosions in the Sky, Mogwai, God Speed! You Black Emperor) that just put out an amazing new record, "Waking Season."

I've seen them many times in the past and they've always left me with the impression that while they had potential, they just need time to mature as a group to really nail that particular sound. I think they've finally done it with this latest one; it's on my short list for favorite albums of 2012.

This video will melt a hole in your computer's face:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V5XzieplhgM

Doors at 7pm
Show at 8pm

The Sinclair is the shiny new venue in Harvard Square that is having a horrible time getting its doors open. Liquor license problems, construction delays, neighborhood sourpusses; the rumors abound. Let's hope they can get their shit together in time for this show. I'll be pissed if the second act I buy for this venue gets pushed to another club.
item.name: Caspian @ The Royale
